modules.description: Handles source code highlighting by converting code strings into HTML representations. Operates on source code strings and language identifiers, returning HTML strings with syntax highlighting applied. Useful for rendering code snippets in web interfaces or documentation generators.

This module processes Markdown documents by transforming code blocks into HTML with syntax highlighting. It operates on the Omd abstract syntax tree, specifically extracting code blocks and replacing them with highlighted HTML spans. It supports a predefined list of programming languages for syntax highlighting.

This module provides syntax highlighting for source code by converting code strings and language identifiers into HTML representations. It supports processing both raw code snippets and Markdown documents, with integration into the Omd AST for transforming code blocks into highlighted HTML spans. Main data types include source code strings, language identifiers, and HTML output. For example, it can render a Python code snippet as syntax-highlighted HTML or process a Markdown file to replace code blocks with styled HTML elements.
